description: An AI agent monitors sensor data from a semiconductor fabrication plant to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The system operates normally, learning and adapting to changing conditions over time.  The goal is to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency.
initial_goal: Minimize equipment downtime in the semiconductor fab by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data analysis.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing, specifically a high-volume memory chip fabrication plant.
